channel.title: RotateX - Custom server needs active staff
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7]RotateX[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]RotateX is a new server that is actually based on it's players wants. I had 5 people beta test my server and tell me what I should add that people would like. Even though the server is up, I'll take any suggestions on what should be added into the game. RotateX may be a 317 but we offer newer modeled items such as Torva and Drygores. I add in custom items that people recommend and also add in items that people have made! I want my server to actually be based on what the player is interested in, not what I'm interested in. [/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/11mdl3r_th.png[/img][SIZE=5][color=yellow]Server Links[/COLOR][/SIZE] [url=http://"http://www.rotatexrsps.com"][SIZE=4]Website[/size][/url]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/11mdl3r_th.png[/img][SIZE=5][COLOR=yellow]Key Features[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=4][COLOR=red]- Working on Automatic Voting. - Tons of custom items. - Custom Interfaces,Maps. - IPB Forums that are Complete - Great Community. - Tons of Achievements. - Active Staff - Many Custom Zones - Donator and Super Donator Ranks with their own Custom Zones(Will be adding more Ranks in the future) - Many Custom NPC's! - Dicing and other forms of Gambling [/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4675632/donatorzone.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4675633/Home.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4675635/Rare_Zone.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4675636/shops.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4675637/skilling.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4675638/Screenshot_9.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

Just checked out this server, and kinda enjoy it for now.

item.title: RotateX - Custom server needs active staff
item.dc:creator: @CSharp95 CSharp95
item.description:
@CSharp95 wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:6, topic:551331”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=670246.msg4481927#msg4481927 date=1430698868]
[URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/c7sceu16y99oe1k/RotateX%20Client%20and%20Cache.rar?dl=0][SIZE=4]Client Download[/SIZE][/URL]

Fixed your download link, also JAR the client. People can do a lot of things when you give them all your client files. Bad things.
[/quote]

Even jarring the client these days isn’t enough. Anyone can just decompile the jar and kaboom -I have da powa-

But yeah seriously, I hope you no longer have the client files in the download or else gf server.[/quote]
At least if they have the patience to fix hundreds of errors.
http://proguard.sourceforge.net/

Why is active staff a feature if you’re advertising in your title that you need active staff?

Read full topic

Even jarring the client these days isn’t enough. Anyone can just decompile the jar and kaboom -I have da powa-

But yeah seriously, I hope you no longer have the client files in the download or else gf server.[/quote]
they never were, i just couldn’t get the cache downloader to work. so i put the cache and the jar in the same archive

item.title: RotateX - Custom server needs active staff
item.dc:creator: @rotatexrsps rotatexrsps
item.description:
@rotatexrsps wrote:

WarTusk-RSPS:

Nice job it looks like you made a lot of changes to your server! I suggest you spread your npc’s out a little bit. You got a whole world to use those unicorns need some breathing room. Good luck!

maybe they enjoy ass-mouth

nah jk. thanks

Read full topic
